extension.summary: Provides PVR remider service for XBMC.
extension.description:
The add-on provides five reminders for programs in the Kodi PVR
Credits - Cron-like helper classes CronTab and Event inspired by an answer by Brian on http://stackoverflow.com/questions/373335/suggestions-for-a-cron-like-scheduler-in-python/374207#374207
- Clock clip art https://openclipart.org/detail/12591/alarm-clock-by-anonymous-12591
